title: [Lysierian Hills, Lake Marliese]
description: Here at the shallowest part of the lake, thick blades of grass just break the surface of the water.  A chorus of frogs croak out their welcome, their guttural night song echoing with an odd harmony across the valley.

Here at the shallowest part of the lake, bright green blades of grass just break the surface of the water.  A chorus of frogs croak out their welcome, their guttural song echoing with an odd harmony across the valley.
